channel.title: Music on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in Music on MyThinkPond

item.title: Android Phone Tamil Music
item.description: If you or someone owns an Android based phone such as Nexus One, HTC Droid, or HTC Incredible and would like to listen to some Tamil music streams. I’ve setup a server that streams live 24x7 latest tamil music. [After posting it I’ve had comments about some usability issues by using the default MP3 player in Nexus One. So I’m revising the steps.] Under Android Market Place, search for an application “A Online Radio”.
